content.html: I've been pretty quiet here cause atm I have the emotional fortitude of a waitrose basque cheesecake (which I'm incidentally obsessed with and could eat a whole one every day). At least my wordle thread is a daily update that I'm still around and doing nerdy shit on the daily ðŸ˜‚
content.value:
I've been pretty quiet here cause atm I have the emotional fortitude of a waitrose basque cheesecake (which I'm incidentally obsessed with and could eat a whole one every day).

At least my wordle thread is a daily update that I'm still around and doing nerdy shit on the daily ðŸ˜‚
